articles.title: HP Omen 15 (2020), Pavilion Gaming 16 Laptops With Up to 10th-Gen Intel Core Processors Launched - Gadgets 360
articles.description: HP today launched its new Omen 15 and a Pavilion Gaming 16 gaming laptops. The new Omen 15 has Intel and AMD processors, with up to 10th-generation Intel Core i7 and up to AMD Ryzen 7 amongst the options.
articles.content: HP has expanded its range of gaming laptops with the launch of a new Omen 15 and a Pavilion Gaming 16. The new Omen 15 model comes in a redesigned chassis that has a smaller footprint than the previo… [+3194 chars]
